ProductOverview.Summary: Harmony is an open-source data integration and analytics platform designed to support public health systems by consolidating and analyzing structured data from multiple sources.
ProductOverview.Description: Data integration, harmonization, analytics, and visualization for health and climate programs.
ProductOverview.Users: Ministries of health, public health agencies, data managers, frontline workers.

Reach.SummaryOfReach: Used in 9 countries directly, and in over 25 countries through global initiatives.

Maturity.SummaryOfMaturity: Well-established platform with strong community support and proven implementations.

ClimateAndHealthIntegration.Description: Supports data integration from multiple sources, including health management information systems and climate sources, enabling cross-sector insights.

Community.DescriptionOfCommunity: Active community focused on data integration and analytics for public health systems.

Community.description: Slack workspace, direct collaboration with country teams

Events.description: Regular community meetings and collaboration sessions.

InclusiveDesign.Description: Harmony's software design process is rooted in a human-centered, iterative development approach.
InclusiveDesign.UserInput: Actively incorporates input from a diverse group of users across the health system.

EnvironmentalImpact.LowCarbon: Optimized for efficient data processing and can be deployed on green infrastructure to minimize environmental impact.

TotalCostOfOwnership.Description: Open-source and free to use; support and implementation costs vary.

Sustainability.Description: Grant funding, government contracts, equity investment.
